==============

The young John and Mary were abandoned by their parents in the dark forest and wind up in the home of an evil witch. But what seemed to be the end turned out to be the beginning of a life full of adventures, since they eliminated the evil and turned true exterminators evil creatures. After the disappearance of several children, both now adults (Jeremy Renner and Gemma Arterton) are employed by local authorities to unravel the mystery. Only they did not realize that this new mission would put them before the terrible Black Witch (Famke Janssen), ready to destroy not only the reputation of excellent witch hunters, but also their lives.
